message: Someone already uses Mac OS X Lion and has got problems?!
My biggest problem: AutoCAD for Mac 2011 doesn't work anymore. Embarrassing for Autodesk.
My wireless sometimes fails it stop sending and receiving data, but the network preferences says that it is well connected, and I don't like that it doesn't awake as fast as leopard
does anyone know why services no longer when symlinked from another directory into ~/Library/Services ... this worked in 10.6 and allowed me to keep my services under version control.
Lion ran like a dog on my MBP until I upgraded from 4 to 8GB of RAM. Now it's wonderful :)
weird, mine is running brilliantly on 4GB
